review_data.title: Best bar in zurich - will it still be with new mgmt?
review_data.content: I love this bar and given I frequented it often for lunch, after work drinks, dinner or lazy saturday afternoons, I am having a very hard time finding a substitute ever since they closed in December. New management: please leave it just as it was....More

review_data.title: after work meet up place
review_data.content: nice old bar, been around for ages and the meeting place for all the bankers and lawyers to come have a drink. Beautiful place and i would recommend a stop, but sure to come before 5 pm as it gets crowded very quick

review_data.title: Nice place to be with friends
review_data.content: Was there with some work colleagues. The bar/restaurant is very nicely done and comfortable. The food was good - a little too much though. I had the club sandwich which I can recommend. They have a good selection of traditional bar food and some specials....More

review_data.title: Not as great as it appears to be

review_data.title: Fun birthday night out!

review_data.title: Have quite a few whiskies
review_data.content: They have quite a few whiskies at this place. Had a Glenmorangie Port Wood Finish - nice. The food they served at the table next-by seemed nice too (but I didn't try).

review_data.title: it's the atmosphere
review_data.content: definitaly not your classic Zurich bar/restaurant, but that's exactly what we like about it.
